channel.title: Texan Mason
channel.description: The adventures of a clueless millennial Mason in North Texas.

item.title: Proto-Scottish Rite Masonry: Complicated flowcharts - Scottish Rite edition
item.description:
Original flowchart by Brother Timothy Edwards: image::http://texanmason.com/posts/20160919-img1.png[Original FlowChart]

Cleaned-up version that I made: image::http://texanmason.com/posts/20160919-img2.jpg[New FlowChart]
